text: Matt Ford is a lighting designer based in Los Angeles, California. Notable projects include NBC's Hollywood Game Night, America's Got Talent, ABC's Jimmy Kimmel Live!, CW's Penn and Teller Fool Us, among others. He has designed lighting for a wide range of television productions over his career.
